General.Name: Atec Co. Ltd
General.Description: Atec Co. Ltd. manufactures and sells display products primarily in South Korea. The company offers various products, such as LCD monitors, DIDs, LCD all-in-one PCs, and security all-in-one PCs equipped with the security solution. It also provides information processing consulting services. Atec Co. Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.

3.Name: Hyo-Ki  Cho
3.Title: Managing Director and Chief of R&D Center
